characters.name: Eric Cartman
characters.description: Cartman is sometimes the main antagonist of an episode.

characters.name: Kenny McCormick
characters.description: Kenny is most famous for dying in almost every episode in the first five seasons of South Park.

characters.name: Kyle Broflovski
characters.description: Kyle Broflovski is one of South Park's main characters. He is often noted for his intelligence
